actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 612 of title 38, United States Code, to provide outpatient dental services and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability rated at 50 percent or more.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to furnish outpatient dental services to veterans with a 50 percent rated service-connected disability.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 612 of title 38, United States Code, to provide outpatient dental services and treatment to any veteran who has a service-connected disability rated at 50 percent or more.
